website_summaries.verdict: With a fantastic blend of affordability, style, and quality, this well priced salt and pepper grinder set ticks all the boxes.
pros: Elegant and attractive design is pleasing enough to earn a permanent spot on any counter top
Top positioned grinding mechanism eliminates surface mess
Non-corrosive ceramic grinder is suitable for all types of salt
Large capacity cuts down on refill frequency, yet it is slim and contoured for comfortable handling
Clear glass and stainless steel design is clean and modern
Includes stand for easy storage and lids for freshness

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk! After not even 2 months, the screw where you adjust the grinder completly broke, making the grinder completly useless.. *UPDATE* I updated my rating from 1 to 5 stars, because I must've purchased a defective product, and this seller went above and beyond to replace my product. Probably it was the best customer service I've experienced in a while! I received my new unit and it works perfectly. I'll definitely buy more products from this seller. Thank you, Willow & Everett for being so fast in resolving my issue!
customer_reviews.author: Bogdan T.

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and grind well too.
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice grinders. The stand is a nice bonus specially when setting a table. I also like the cap, it adds a nice finishing touch. I don't know if these are "forever" Salt and Pepper grinders but they seem very well built and should be a good value. The company seems genuinely interested in customer satisfaction and appears to want to do anything reasonable to make things right. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Jose F. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: NOT MADE IN AMERICA
customer_reviews.text: This item lead me to believe it was American made with the picture of the American flag and The comment “your purchase supports our US owned small business” was very misleading and I was upset to see “Made in China” on the box when it arrived. I immediately returned this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Post

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size grinder for the glass container.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the item that I received. The glass container is not the correct size for the grinder that comes with it. When it is screwed on the glass does not fit flush with the bottom of the grinder. I have a short grinder set and the glass and grinder are flush when screwed together. The bottom of the grinder extends beyond the glass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but they dont adjust.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking set, but comes with a card inside, "ATTENTION, Text Spice2 to (phone number) to RECEIVE your use/care instructions." Really? Why can't this just be in the box? Instant disappointment, and no response to text. Packaging says something about a "hidden adjustable screw" ours wont even adjust. I know this is a pretty simple item, but ours wont adjust. The top cap just spins right off, the porcelain grinder doesn't move. Not impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate Grinders
customer_reviews.text: The glass container is not very durable. One of the grinders broke when I placed it on my kitchen counter. The glass container is not thick relative to other grinder I have used in the past The other issue is the grinder itself. It is acceptable for grinding peppercorn, although it is not as adjustable for fine grinding as you would expect. Finally, the grinder is totally useless for sea salt. The rocks are simply to hard for the grinder
customer_reviews.author: Cdub

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand all the good reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this set for about 5 months and am very disappointed. The main issue is the fact that the grinder does not seem capable of grinding black peppercorns. I have experimented with every setting on the grinder, and the only way that the peppercorns actually feed through is if you set the grind to extremely coarse. Anything less and virtually nothing comes out of it. My only other complaint is simply the design. Having those extra caps to deal with is not something I need to bring to my dinner table.
customer_reviews.author: Music Lover 327

customer_reviews.title: Bad stand
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get a chance to try the grinders. I am returning because of the stand. It has had one of the arms broken off and welded back on in such a way that one of the grinders won't fit properly. It just looks bad. It's a shame because this was a test purchase. If I had liked them, I would have been ordering a bunch for a restaurant. Update: the seller has contacted me and I am happy with the customer service. I'll re-order and then test the grinders out.
customer_reviews.author: james bowman

customer_reviews.title: Item broke after week of use with sale and peppercorns. Not worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I receicex This item may 12th, It is already not working. The pieces that crack the pepper are loose and almost falling out. Item looks good but functionality wise, It is faulty! Would love to get a replacement but don’t have a way of contacting seller.
customer_reviews.author: Russell B

customer_reviews.title: Great grinders
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these S&P grinders because I was looking for a nice, tall glass set. They seem pretty good quality, especially for the price. The glass is thick and it grinds very smoothly. They aren't difficult to turn at all (we have been using them for about a week with full size peppercorn and coarse Himalayan salt) . I personally don't use the stand as I find it annoying to keep removing them (we use a lot of pepper :) ) and it gets a little hung up on the stand depending on which angle you pull them out at. They are perfect for what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: cj

customer_reviews.title: Worthless metal screws inside - Corrosion
customer_reviews.text: The screws used in the center plastic grinder are regular metal. With SALT they will corrode in no time and break off if you attempt to unscrew to clean. If you clean and oil (food grade type) often you should be ok. Otherwise, look for higher quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, defective, made in China
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality, made in China. One of the plastic pieces was near impossible to twist while the other one was too loose. It’s also awkward removing it from the metal stand since you have to pull it out from the side but habitually you’d pull it upwards and end up ripping the whole unit. I‘m currently in the process of exchanging this for a new one. If the new product has no defects on the plastic spinning piece, I’ll change my review. For now, it stands. ***UPDATE*** Replacement came. One of them works fine. The other is just a disaster. The pieces that come together do not work in sync. One of them doesn’t work at all. Terrible product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Product Won't Last.. For those that care
customer_reviews.text: This device is just OK. Given today's standards where if something lasts more than 6 or 12 months it gets a positive review. I'm here because this item just isn't built for the long haul. The internals are plastic and after months of use the adjustment seized up. Now I could of probably left it the way it was and got another 6 months out of it but I really wanted to change the size of granules. The plastic sheered off and the grinder hit the landfill. I'm slowly starting to see over many years of "trying" things out that you get what you pay for. I'll continue to search for quality over the current deal of the day...
customer_reviews.author: D. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary grinders!
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift to my boyfriend and they work BEAUTIFULLY. So please with picking this company. The grind on these is adjustable for a finer or more coarse texture. They do not catch during the grinding process like most salt or pepper grinders. These are beautiful with clean stainless steel and the little caddy included is just top notch. Easy carrying from storage to table if necessary. Would 100% purchase these again. We want to get another set for different flavors of salt and pepper or other spices!
customer_reviews.author: killahpandah

customer_reviews.title: Just get these.
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty, it is awesome, it grinds himalayan rock salt and whole peppercorns fine, it is dishwasher safe. Seriously, what more can you ask of it? If you're as stupid as I am and accidentally puts your grinder-shakers on hot, still-turned-on glass stoves, MULTIPLE TIMES, which was what happened to my previous ones, plastic, obviously melted, this set won't care because they are made of thick glass and metal. Also you have a carrier with this set. You can carry this set of two with one pinky. Plus the design is sleek and minimal, I'm sure it goes with most kitchen designs. Just get these.
customer_reviews.author: Andriana DeBoer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Designed
customer_reviews.text: I needed new salt and pepper grinders and this set looked like it would be perfect. They are much larger than I thought and they do not arrived filled, so make sure you have the ingredients before they arrive. I would have given it 5 stars if they had included directions on how to adjust the coarseness. Instead, the text on the back of the box stated that you could adjust it by the hidden screw, but never mentioned where it is hiding. I emailed Willow & Everett and discovered that the hidden screw is actually the black "dial" that is visible as soon as you remove the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Wood

customer_reviews.title: Pepper grinder stopped grinding
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my return window closed one month before we started having problems with the pepper grinder. No matter how much we adjust the peppercorns will not grind properly or at all. It is very frustrating! The salt grinder works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Burris

customer_reviews.title: Love the Grinders BUT the rack broke
customer_reviews.text: The design of these are so much better then my old set that left salt and pepper all over the counter. Since the bottom of these sits upward with a cover they are a lot neater. The holder makes it nice to transport to the table. They do a good job grinding and have adjustable grind mechanism for fine or course salt and pepper. Nice set! BUT that being said, the welds on the rack broke and I can't use it...darn because I loved the design and how it was easy to transport to the table when needed.
customer_reviews.author: CharO

customer_reviews.title: Supplied wire rack is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Our arrived with the wire rack bent, but even if not bent, it's a cheap item that would be better left off the product altogether. The mills themselves seem to be of nice quality, glass bottom, only time will tell how the grinders hold up, but at this price not expecting a lifetime of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Otis B. Driftwood

customer_reviews.title: All the Best Features!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this salt and pepper shaker set. The vessels are large, so I won’t have to refill them often. Another great feature is that they won’t spill out from the bottom because the grinder is on top. I didn’t see any other sets with that feature. These also come with a nice holder to keep them tidy together, and to carry them. If you want a really nice set, and get this one. I’m glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Nice grinder set
customer_reviews.text: The grinders are a good shape and size for ease of use. I believe the blades are ceramic, which is fine for home use. Otherwise steel grinders are the way to go, but they are much more expensive. One issue I have is the stand that comes with this. The arms aren't the smoothest feeling and have a tight feel when inserting the grinders. I'm afraid one day it may scratch the body, and it's just more difficult to use because of it's tightness. Also, my grinders appear to rest on the stand at different heights and don't actually touch the base of the stand. I ended up not using the stand. But at this price I can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Much less mess!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted glass so I could see when to refill these. They hold quite a lot of salt and pepper. They are comfortable in the hand and easy to turn. The adjustment for the coarse to fine is a little tricky but if done with care will work, just be gentle. It is nice not to have the same mess with a grinder. Pepper stays in the pepper grinder, salt stays in the salt grinder, much cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Scooter017

customer_reviews.title: Terrible waste
customer_reviews.text: Although the set is aesthetically pleasing, it was a waste. The design is problematic- the holder is too wide for the grinders, so they EASILY slip around and fall out. The holder cannot be used to transport these, otherwise they fall out. I was moving the set around to clean my counter, and the pepper grinder fell out, and literally shattered in around 30 tiny pieces. I had only had the set for a month. Waste of money, I do NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Silverstar777

customer_reviews.title: Not the easiest to use...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't love this like I thought I would. Be aware: the salt and pepper shakers each have lids on them. This is good for preventing a mess (especially with the pepper grinder) but it is inconvenient when cooking. Also, the little stand is not super sturdy. You have to be a bit careful getting them in and out of the stand or it will fall over. To use, you have to take it out of the stand, take off the lid, grind the salt or pepper, put the lid back on, and and place it back in its holder. Adds a few steps for people who are in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: atyk2018

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall and thin build.
customer_reviews.text: These grinders feel like they may last longer than the previous ones that were the short stainless steel models. Be warned..., don't get any moister in the salt grinding mechanism as the metal threaded bolt will corrode and weld itself to the grinding adjustment knob and then break off when you try to forcefully turn it to adjust salt granules. I took mine camping and the rain got into the mechanism and I failed to notice. Otherwise, these products work nicely! Use indoors. =)
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Lovely addition to the table or countertop
customer_reviews.text: These are large and curvaceous. Beautifully designed, feel great in the hand, display my tri-color peppercorn mix and pink Himalayan sea salts in an aesthetically pleasing way, easy to fill, and grind smoothly and well. What more could you ask for? How about being decently priced? Sure enough. What about providing a handy little stand for carrying and displaying? Yes, indeed. Here's the thing: If you like food and, better yet, like said food to be pleasing to the palette, then you're doing yourself a disservice by not buying them. So, hop to it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. Isom

customer_reviews.title: So far. Can't complain
customer_reviews.text: they're not that bad I'm a little bit concerned with the plastic components they haven't broken yet but I've read a couple of reviews where the internal parts have broken I haven't had an issue yet but I am a little bit concerned with the quality of the internals that actually do the grinding of any materials that you put in with it be salt or pepper but as of yet not that bad but would have been better to see me some slightly better quality materials used as far as the internals are concerned
customer_reviews.author: osvaldocintron

customer_reviews.title: Keep the spice on your plate, not on the table
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets of grinders to dispense sea salt, spicy salt, peppercorn, and Hawaiian pink salt. They work as intended, the knob that regulates the coarseness of the grind is hard plastic, but the internal grinding mechanism is ceramic, very hard and durable. The set looks great on our table, the glass is easy to clean (the grinder a bit less so) and the finish is very pleasant to the eye. I had an assortment of sizes and shapes on my table to dispense salt, pepper and spices, but now it looks much better. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto (AKA Robertdoc)

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, adjustable and classy.
customer_reviews.text: They are nicer and bigger than expected. They work really well. I use them while cooking which they are perfect for. They are easy to hold and easy to clean. They also allow you to adjust the coarseness of the grind. I bought a large bag of salt and peppercorns and I'm glad I did. I'll have these forever. (They also fit perfectly in my kitchen.)
customer_reviews.author: US Person of Interest

customer_reviews.title: PEPPER MILL SUBPAR
customer_reviews.text: The pepper mill does not work well. Not much pepper is produced. The salt mill works fine. The two mills seem identical so perhaps the problem is with peppercorns being larger and harder than rock salt. There is an adjustment for size of grind but, it is ineffective. The holder is handy for storage until you use one and then it falls over due to the weight of the mill left in the holder. The holder works well for carrying. Everyone has different expectations but, I am replacing this set.
customer_reviews.author: moonwalker

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of this salt and pepper set but it has a major flaw; it’s now balanced. I’m picky I just want to pick up a pepper grinder and use it. I couldn’t even figure out how to position it. Right side up in the holder, they kept falling over, the holder is useless, the only way they worked was to put them upside down. Then to use take off the top. My husband likes them so I didn’t send them back but I think they are hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: MJ VanHecker

customer_reviews.title: Best salt and pepper grinders I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: These grinders are awesome! You twist once or twice and have enough salt or pepper in a couple of seconds. My old ones had to be twisted around about a dozen times to get enough salt or pepper out. I am buying two more since we keep moving these things between the kitchen and dining room almost daily. Nobody wants to use the old ones anymore! Because they are so efficient, you might want to be careful about how much you twist in one spot, or you might "overdose" :)
customer_reviews.author: Finn Markmanrud

customer_reviews.title: The Best Grinders EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a must-have for any kitchen. I purchased two of these and they are awesome. I'm glad I bought one for my son and daughter-in-law too and they loved it. It doesn't get all over the table like other salt and pepper Grinders and holds it in the cap. You can adjust it how coarse or fine you want your salt and pepper. I would definitely recommend anyone to buy these and would purchase them for a great gift for anyone that loves to cook in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Spitfire526

customer_reviews.title: Nice but...
customer_reviews.text: I've had for about a month and already the salt gear is breaking. It's getting harder to change the setting of the salt and it just spins in place. I have a feeling I'm going to have to end up buying something better quality in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Readence

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, stylish grinders for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Glass bodies of these grinders are easy to clean, provide a comfortable grip and nice hefty feel in my hand. Wonderful design, modern style looks great in our home. Top dispensing orientation took a few uses to become instinctive but totally eliminates the need for the catch plate “normal” grinders require. Grind size (coarseness) adjusters are smooth and effective, requiring just a slight single-finger tap to quickly switch from coarse to fine or back. Brushed stainless tops and collars resist fingerprints, clean easily and are interchangeable. When you can see the contents, color coded tops are completely unnecessary.
customer_reviews.author: Squidsct54

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: The set is the best I could find for the price. I really like the grinders and stand. There are 2 adults in the family so no misuse. The salt used in one grinder is garlic salt so not really used every day. The adjustment screw has sheered off. I have contacted the company but at this point have heard nothing. I am willing to pay for a new top but can't find a replacement. Anything can break but there needs to be a way to get a replacement part. If there is resolve this post will be updated.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Shire

customer_reviews.title: FASTEST DELIVERY IN THE HISTORY OF ORDERING ON AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. Excellent product, well made, visually satisfying. Will so grace the dinner table when friends come over and also for everyday elegance. Filled them right up, grinders are perfection delight. Easy to adjust which textures you prefer. Ordered on July 3rd and arrived on Sunday July 5th from Kentucky, we live in PA. Amazing!!!! Thanks a million for this outstanding item. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosey.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & Practical!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these, and they work great too. There are different ways you can turn for different sizes of grinds which is a nice feature. I love the stainless steel, and I love that it comes with a holder so it's easy to move around. The caps prevent extra salt or pepper grinds from spilling out which is awesome! They are the perfect centerpiece accent for my table, and they’re useful!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Some annoyances but great design and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Having to take the covers off and put them on again is a bit of a pain. The holder for them is pointless and also a pain. I have NO idea what "sheerness" means on the review choices. A few other things I've noticed: the salt and pepper seems to fly everywhere when grinding it and the salt gets ground down really quickly (as compared to a disposable grinder from Costco that I used to use. This is one reason I bought this--to avoid disposable plastic grinders). Overall, I am happy with this purchase because it seems like good quality and I really like the design and the way it looks!
customer_reviews.author: Jozee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: grinders are good but the stand is NOT stable and easily falls over Well very occasionally a company really puts the SERVICE is the customer experience and this is one of those times. Out of the blue, I got a personal email from Sean who sent another shorter set of grinders that work GREAT at no cost which is amazing that they CARE so much! After being looked after like this they have earned my business for life - thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Roux Laflame

customer_reviews.title: Defective design
customer_reviews.text: I’m mad that the product design is not holding up. The ring near the grinder keeps falling down and it looks terrible. Too much of a hassle for me to return.
customer_reviews.author: rob vogel

customer_reviews.title: Salt Grinder Locked Up
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. The grinder we put salt in locks up. Unlocked once but locked again. Grinder mechanism can't handle larger Himalayan salt crystals. The new grinders we bought to replace them do the job nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Natural Solutions Seeker

customer_reviews.title: On a budget? Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and you don't need electric grinders with bells, whistles and lasers, and generally you can't justify something that makes salt into smaller salt costing upwards of $60, then this set is for you. Unpretentious, looks nice, works well, has adjustable coarseness and won't slice open your wallet guts-to-garters, this seems to be the best balance of quality and cost I've found on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M. Dooley

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart/Broke after just a couple months!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful when received. Unfortunately, after only a couple months use, I picked up the salt shaker (without undo force) only to watch the bottom of it completely fall out. The glass literally broke off and I had salt and broken glass everywhere! What a waste. Disappointed bc I really liked the look and function of them up until this tragedy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R. Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: They are OK, but
customer_reviews.text: I had to bend the arms of the shaker holder to allow the both the salt and pepper to be removed without knocking the entire thing over. I bent the open a bit and now it works OK. Also the covers, not my favorite. Covers on these items are not needed. They get misplaced pretty much every time I cook. That said, they both work fine however, know that these come empty.
customer_reviews.author: W.S.V

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Were these worth the $20 I spent on them? No. But is the holder it comes with flimsy and basically useless? Yes. However, it does the job and holds a lot of peppercorns or other large spices. I'm using this for black pepper and coriander and it serves its primary function well. Seasoning with these instead of the grocery store built-in pepper is much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Fancy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend to class up your kitchen. I cook every day so I go through salt and pepper like nobodies business and I was wasting money on the cheap grinders and ended up throwing all of those away. This work super well and I like them a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Howell

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy spend your money on better grindr.
customer_reviews.text: I baught this set because of all the reviews it had so I didn't expected it to be bad. Unfortunately for me I completely dislike this product I just threw it away because I didn't want to bother with returning it. The outside construction seems good but the blastic grindr barely works. I did my research now and I've order the unicorn pepper grindr and I recommend you to look into that one. I should have done my research like I always do before buying something. You get what you pay for. Look for a grindr with a metal cunstruction.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Somoza

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I've owned in 2 years. We use these often- several times a day. The grinding gear is made of plastic so it won't last forever. I overtightened the first set which locked up the grinder and the plastic cracked. Otherwise tases do a nice job of producing fine to course salt and pepper. If you stay away from user error they should be quite durable!
customer_reviews.author: Ruralroute2

customer_reviews.title: The grinders are great...
customer_reviews.text: ... but the stand is crap. Ours came with one side bent... my husband tried to fix it as best he could. The next day, I was taking the pepper grinder out (it was in the side that had seemed fine), and it caught, pulling the stand off the counter with the salt grinder, which promptly shattered on the floor. Not even one day’s worth of use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but works fine
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t impressed by the packaging or quality of the product. The stand is cheap and almost annoying to use. It works but I would not gift this product or buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Spradlin

customer_reviews.title: A Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this set is the 7 1/2 inch height. The tops are a beautiful brushed stainless steel. I was surprised at how thick the glass base is. The settings are simple to adjust. I use them to grind Himalayan salt, and black pepper corn. I recommend this set because they are attractive, well made, and function well.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: Grinds himilayan sea salt so finely! Magnet caps
customer_reviews.text: This pretty saltnpepper grinders make a pretty table piece. I put pink himalayan sea salt and it could grind it so fine. What i would change is make the holder extend around the shaker as it falls off the holder. You cannot pass it to another using holder. I really enjoy the grinder MAGNETIC caps in stainless. i dont make a mess! I do love how fine it grinds.
customer_reviews.author: Gijoe07

customer_reviews.title: little shards of black plastic like to mix with the salt when you use the product.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this product, noticed small plastic pieces start to get grind when you grind the salt with it. Not good for your health. dont recommend the product. Aesthetically it looks nice, but you need to redo your grinder design, i don't enjoy small microscopic shards of plastic mixed with my salt which gets ingested.......
customer_reviews.author: Hidden In the Jungle

customer_reviews.title: Works decently but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat big and cumbersome to use. Ground well but coarseness is difficult to control. Glass very brittle and it took a not very hard placement onto engineered quartz countertop to crack the glass. One happened, thought it was a fluke then the second shattered soon thereafter. Holder is flimsy and not suitable for holding the grinders.
customer_reviews.author: msbadr0

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality control
customer_reviews.text: For convenience sake, I paid a few $$$ extra for an included holder for the Salt and Pepper grinders. The grinders themselves seem to be well made and hopefully will last. However the holder is missing one of the metal balls that are used as feet (see Pic). The piece did not fall off in shipping as it was not in the well sealed box. The only conclusion is that it was packed and shipped in it's defective status. If I was reviewing the option without the stand these are excellent items. However, I paid extra for something that has no value.
customer_reviews.author: milli71

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.text: I also sent this message to the seller. One of the shakers had white stuff all over the glass (I washed it off); the top part, that unscrews from the glass bottom, had some kind of oily goo that wouldn’t come off; after hand washing, there were four major rust spots on the “stainless steel” stand. I asked for a refund and was told too bad, too sad - past the refund date😩 I will never, ever buy anything from Willow and Everett!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Work great, not the best holder
customer_reviews.text: I really like these salt and pepper grinders. My one complaint would be taking them in and out of the holder is a pain, I feel like I scratch the outside of the units each time, so I don't even use that anymore. If I had company I might pull it out, but most likely will get thrown away in time. The sizes are great and refilling them is a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser0810

customer_reviews.title: Easy to refill and adjust!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting something like this for awhile and am glad I got this one. I like the stronger taste of grinding pepper this way compared to a spice bottle and also having to use less salt when using this grinder. Easy to turn and refill, no problems so far. Nice to display on counter! Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mamabirdie

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: It is ok for a grinder. Too much still left in the grinding area when you cap it. Looks better in the picture but I was tired of replacing my electric ones every year.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Greer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these salt and pepper grinders about a year ago and a few months after buying them the salt shaker stopped working. I fiddled with it but couldn't figure out how to fix it or what was wrong with it. The pepper grinder still works, but it's not very good at a fine grind, and the larger grind seems to take forever to get a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque W

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Looks very pretty and the grinders work well. The stand isn’t very sturdy though . And the lids do not screw on so they constantly fall off. Overall it works, but it’s not the quality I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Meesh

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Himalayan Salt and Peppercorn Glass Dispensers
customer_reviews.text: These work well and are easy to turn and adjustable for size of particles...different than using a normal salt ornpepper shaker but a whole lot more reliable in getting what you want. They are made of really good quality...just make sure your hands are not wet when using as glass can get a little slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cayouette

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for work and we have not used them much yet, but the little I have done I am very impressed. The size is ample and finally, I can grind pepper at a higher quantity than most grinders. As an added bonus, it was very easy to fill and the stand they sit in will be so great for carrying them to the table. I liked them so much that I am going to order a set for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the BEST
customer_reviews.text: I have order several of these salt and pepper mills. They make great gifts. I think that they have a ceramic disk that mills the pepper and salt (pink Himalayan, in my case) with ease. No morde great big chunks of pepper. No more clunky grinding. Just a smooth grinding of whatever you put in these things. Everyone that I have given these to absolutely love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richfield Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Outside gear stripped out after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The PLASTIC gear surrounding the ceramic grinder stripped out 6 months in. Sad because I like these otherwise. The caps and holder are great.
customer_reviews.author: B Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice salt and pepper grinders.
customer_reviews.text: I like this one because it is taller instead of fatter like others. Takes up less table space. Seems to work just fine. Only issue is the mount is a little tight, holding the grinders. It is easier to insert at the skinny part and let it fall naturally to it's resting position.
customer_reviews.author: GREEN-HORNET

customer_reviews.title: 4.7 Stars - Great Product, But I Shouldn't Have To Request The User Manual
customer_reviews.text: They are great-looking, sturdy shakers, and the stand is a very nice addition. However, if I didn't request the manual, I wouldn't have known how to properly grind the salt and pepper. To be honest, it was BECAUSE they looked so good that I requested the user guide. I didn't want to ruin them. Normally, I wouldn't have sent an email out to get the Guide.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: I feel fancy with this set!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these salt and pepper grinders. They are aesthetically pleasing and easy to use. The one flaw I will mention is the grinder. I turned the knob every which way to test the fineness to coarseness ratio and honestly, all settings produced fine results, no coarse. Nonetheless, I still very much love this set as I don’t think any one of my family will care if they have chunks of salt or pepper in their food :).
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh A.

customer_reviews.title: Great salt and pepper grinders with stand
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this salt and pepper grinders is that the grinders are on top so there is no fallout. The clear body let's you see when you need to refill. The tops and grinders are stainless steel and the stand holds the grinders and makes a great presentation when on display. This would be a great gift! I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patz

customer_reviews.title: Best Grinder set I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: The salt and pepper grinder work very good. My last grinder set was bought from one of my local grocery stores. Had to crank the pepper for a long time to get the amount of pepper I wanted. This pepper grinder gives me a good amount of pepper with just a couple turns, the salt grinder works just as good. A couple of twist and you are ready to go :)
customer_reviews.author: David Young

customer_reviews.title: Ok - kinda meh
customer_reviews.text: These were ok. The holder frame was bent when the package arrived but that’s not a huge deal since I don’t need it. They look really nice, sleek and easy to clean. One grinder seems to work better than the other but both are good enough. I’m not unhappy but not wow’d either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the Grinders stopped grinding
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and had them sitting in my kitchen for a bit until I finally got some sea salt and pepper corn. They worked fine, but then I noticed that the salt one was drizzling out very little. After a while, I figured it might be the salt crystals are to large, so I decided to crush them a little to shrink their size. That did not work. The pepper worked fine, and still does. I then switched the lids to see if it was the grinders, and it was. One of the grinders does not work. They look great...
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product- Works really well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this grinder set to replace a set that wasn't working well, Salt grinder never worked much at all. It is a much higher quality set than my old ones and they cost less. These work extremely well and they don't leave Salt and Pepper on the table after use. Love these and will purchase another set to replace ones in my dining room.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM DIETRICH

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these grinders for a couple of weeks but am very happy with them.. the grinder is easy to turn and does a good job... I say this because I bought a different set , paid a lot for them only to have to replace them because the grinders were on the bottom and got pepper all over the cupboard.. also had another set that the grinders were hard to turn and did not do a good job of grinding... these grinders have solved both problems.. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not the best of grinders
customer_reviews.text: This grinder set does look good for the price but needs some arm strength to grind the salt and pepper. Not sure if I received a defective piece. Also, the quality seems to be a little low for the price. I' m not going to return it as I already started using it and will not recommend it to anyone looking for a decent set.
customer_reviews.author: K.REDD

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set for a Great Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and look very nice for a great price. I bought these to replace a much more expensive set that sat downward and leaked salt and pepper everywhere. One also broke of the more expensive set. I thought I’d try this set and so far so good. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: AngeeEve

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like my new salt and pepper grinders very much. They are sleek and modern looking which fits into my decor very well. I love that the grinder is actually at the top and has a cover. I've had the kind with the grinder on the bottom and they can be very messy. The stand that holds them is really handy also. I'm every happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl hooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Got these to replace an old worn-out wooden set after the burr broke on one. I originally didn't want glass but these are very solid and durable feeling in the hand. Very easy to clean, unlike my wooden ones. I hope to get many years of use out of them. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K.P.Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Salt and Pepper Grinder
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality Stainless Steel Salt and Pepper Grinder. Very attractive on the table. Great gift idea with the (Sherpa) Pink himalayan salt & some Black peppercorn. I don't like the stand. Seem a bit of a hassle to keep putting them back in the stand..
customer_reviews.author: Alleyspazz

customer_reviews.title: A good present and nice grinder
customer_reviews.text: We really like these. We have dropped them on our counter a couple times and they haven't broken. They grind up the salt and pepper finer than the other grinders I've had. The lid helps keep the dust in the air from getting into the salt and pepper. I have given this as a wedding present
customer_reviews.author: Sflet

customer_reviews.title: They won’t bump, but they sure can grind
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old pepper grinder that couldn’t be adjusted any longer. I did quite a bit of comparison of user ratings, price, design, with the many grinder sets available on Amazon. I have not regretted my decision even once since they arrived. I love how course a grind can be dialed in. I had to get some Pink Himalayan salt to use both grinders, and I’ve never had such a distinctive flavored salt.
customer_reviews.author: poison pen

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Grinders - 2 Star Stands
customer_reviews.text: The grinders are great and easy to use. The stand, however, is less than worthless. I get that you're supposed to pull the grinders out sideways, but if you lift at too sharp of an angle (too much "up") you end up knocking the whole thing over. Definitely a pain.
customer_reviews.author: KyraTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Sleek modern design
customer_reviews.text: Love the stand and love the fact these don't have that rubber / plastic plug in the bottom that over time always cracks, fails and you have salt and pepper everywhere. Love that I can leave these on my counter. I filled up the salt shaker too early after cleaning and got a lot of clumping so I washed again and gave it two days to dry before filling again. I think these will meet our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Roweboat

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality - Ultra fine grind possible - adjustable particle size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on a Sunday afternoon and it was shipped that same afternoon! I really love the grinders. They are good quality and the ceramic blades are much better that the plastic I had in the past. I am really enjoying the ultra fine ground pepper & pink salt I can get with these. The metal holder, while attractive, did not work for me as when I would lift the grinders up and out it would make the other one fall. But without it they are perfect - very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Teamsolu

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not the Best
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set for about 6-8 months now. The grinder I use for the Pepper has trouble grinding it seems like. We will twist and twist, and hardly anything comes out. I've learned that if I have it tilted just right, it seems to work fine - but it can be a hassle at times. I find myself buying the one-time use pepper grinders at Kroger ever so often...
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy stand, but great set
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great set. The stand is very flimsy though. It's nice to have tops on the salt and pepper (if you use this outside or want to keep the tops clean), but it's a bit of a pain to keep taking them on and off. You could just keep them off all the time though (and not use the stand). You may also want to double-check that you want to grind your salt. I didn't notice that before ordering so had to get the large chunks of salt to fill it.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson L. van den Herik

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Design
customer_reviews.text: These salt and pepper grinders are wonderful. We got the taller size and they look great on the dining room table. The design is sleek and elegant and the stainless steel tops are perfect. You have to get used to sliding the shakers in and out kind of sideways to follow the metal guiders, instead of pulling them upwards to get them out like some holders, but that no big deal. They look great and also work well!
customer_reviews.author: joanne ertel

customer_reviews.title: Good set of basic salt & pepper grinders
customer_reviews.text: The actual salt and pepper holders are of good quality and easy to use. They look nice in the kitchen. I find that the salt grinder is a little bit more powerful than the pepper. I wish the pepper would grind a bit harder. The stand is very flimsy and I just got rid of it. However they are easy to fill and have not broken yet!
customer_reviews.author: Bre

customer_reviews.title: Salt and pepper
customer_reviews.text: When they came one of the shakers did not seem to work properly but after taking it apart and putting it back I was able to get it working correctly. I like the design and the fact that they are large enough not to have to keep refilling them very often.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect , Don’t hesitate , You’ll love these 💕
customer_reviews.text: If you want quality grinders this is the set for you , the size is perfect nice and tall and look great on the table , I love that it’s a top grinder as the bottom leaves pepper on my spice cabinet shelf this doesn’t happen with these , not to mention their customer service is 5***** Star ! You can’t go wrong , you won’t be sorry
customer_reviews.author: KeegsMom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap grinder piece
customer_reviews.text: Salt grinder great... pepper not so much. The plastic gears on the pepper grinder broke within 2 weeks... I’ll go back to using the disposable ones!
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Love 'Em!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love them! They are pretty and useful! They stand in their own stand (also pretty) and grinder is on top with lid so less mess! They're Grrrreat. Price is also good. They are tall and hold plenty salt n pepper. Thank you for making a 1st rate product.
customer_reviews.author: 🐈🐱🐈🐱

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of having a nice looking set of grinders on my table. I especially love that this set has a stand. It is so nice having adjustable grinders for freshly ground pepper and salt which produce an amount suitable for cooking and for table service. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: bagamuffins

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money, look nice, but  be carful cleaning the grinding mechanism.
customer_reviews.text: They work OK for the money. No instructions on care in or on the box though, not even on the vendor website. I disassembled the grinding mechanism to clean it prior to use after reading some of the other reviews. Let them dry for two days and still had issues with water in the grinder top. I would suggest shaking them out vigorously or better yet using canned air to blow out the grinding mechanism. Water pools inside the rotating part.
customer_reviews.author: uphill both ways

customer_reviews.title: Sleek
customer_reviews.text: Theses are really nice. I love the transparency and the sleekness. The only thing that’s bothersome is taking off the lids to use. However that does have an upside in that they look clean and don’t leave a residue on the counter. I love that it came with the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Carl M Grove III

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: These are nice salt and pepper grinders and are exactly as described. But, I just don’t like them. Turning them upside down and having to take a cap off to use them is awkward for me. Although I read the dimensions as posted, they’re huge when combined in the holder.
customer_reviews.author: EllaStella2020

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted a good salt and pepper set for indoor outdoor use, and I was not disappointed. I can't tell y'all how many times I have dropped these grinders and the most that's happened is the lid came off. They're surprisingly durable and don't clog easily, even in South Georgia humidity. If I had to pick a downside I'd say that they do tend to come out of the holder more easily than I'd like, but that is probably because I move them around a lot and have bad balance anyway. They're definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzi Sherer

customer_reviews.title: Grinder will rust shut and lose the ability to adjust the coarseness
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed the grinders at first and then one of the grinders stopped being able to adjust the coarseness. So I use my trusty pair of pliers to force something to happen because I'm determined and the screw split in half (see photos). Now I have only one grinder. The other will no longer grind anything. I wouldn't recommend a grinder that rusts shut like this. I'm assuming it's because I grind pepper over liquids that are boiling and the steam rusted my grinder but that should be par for the course. Who solely grinds pepper on lukewarm already cooked food? I grind pepper over boiling liquids WAY more often. Anyways, I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Stark

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 grinders before this one. I use whole peppercorns obviously, and use pink Himalayan medium size which are still large. This is the first grinder that has been able to grind the pepper fine. Fresh peppercorns can be strong and I don't like it course in everything. Really like it so far. :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

product_meta.title: Willow & Everett Stainless Steel Salt and Pepper Grinder Set -Tall Shaker, Adjustable Coarseness, Refillable -Sea Salt, Black Peppercorn Mill
product_meta.description: Size:TallAdd some Class to your Kitchen--Our salt and pepper mill set was designed with modern elegance in mind as well as optimal functionality. You reach for salt and pepper every single day, so why not make the experience as well-designed as possible?
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY GLASS AND STAINLESS STEEL GRINDER SET WITH STAND These salt and pepper shakers feature a modern design and are stylish and elegant enough for kitchen-to-table use! *Salt and pepper not included.

BUILT FOR CONVENIENCE AND FUNCTION Unlike other spice grinder sets, this salt and peppermill pair have their grinding mechanism on the top of the grinder, ensuring salt and pepper ends up only on your food -- not all over your table. The ceramic grinder is non-corrosive and won't absorb flavors, while a plastic knob on top of each salt and pepper mill allows you to easily adjust from a fine to coarse grind.

EASY REFILLING WITH NO MESSES Don't you hate constantly having to refill your salt and pepper shakers? set is the perfect size This tall salt and pepper grinder set is the perfect size to cut down on constant refills without being bulky. When you do have to refill, the clear glass bodies will let you know when it's time! The stainless steel top easily screws off revealing a wide opening for easy and mess free refills.

ELEGANT DESIGN With its brushed stainless steel encasing, glass body and ceramic grinder, this unique duo is a professional, sleek addition to any kitchen, with a stainless steel lid that truly "caps" off this beautiful set. No tacky electrical grinders here means no batteries required--only a few effortless twists with your hand to experience that fresh himalayan salt, pepper, or other spice.

HIGHEST QUALITY: Built from the highest quality stainless steel and glass, these salt and pepper grinders are made to last. Featuring over 6,000 reviews with a 4.5 average rating, you can buy with confidence.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars8,394 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
